DOC.brief_summary: This study seek determine telephone counsel improves outcome person moderate severe traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Telephone Intervention After Traumatic Brain Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects recruit three participate TBI Model Systems Care Seattle , Philadelphia , Jackson . After informed consent obtain , information gather injury information subject cognitively , socially , emotionally . After information obtain subject discharge acute rehabilitation unit , subject randomly select receive either standard care discharge standard care plus telephone counseling . The telephone follow-up group receive telephone call research coordinator 3-4 day , 2 , 4 , 8 week , 5 , 7 , 9 , 12 , 15 , 18 , 21 month date injury . The research coordinator work subject problem-solving self-management skill . In addition , research coordinator check family member friend subject give permission speak . An outcome assessment do telephone 12 month 24 month injury .
